knimeNode.name: Paired t-test
knimeNode.shortDescription: A paired (or "dependent") t-test is used to compare the means of observations that are not independent of one another.

fullDescription.intro: Computes statistics for the paired sample t-test. It is designed to compare the means of observations that are not independent of one another.

views.view: Tables with descriptive statistics of the input columns and test statistics of the paired t-test.
